meanings.definition: A person who resides in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The resider of the house greeted us warmly.
meanings.sent2: The new resider of the apartment seems friendly.
meanings.sent3: The resider of the neighborhood always has the best garden.
meanings.sent4: She was like a resider of the forest, knowing every tree and animal.
meanings.sent5: The resider of the castle was known for hosting grand feasts.

meanings.definition: To dwell permanently or for a considerable time.
meanings.sent1: Many families resider in this town for generations.
meanings.sent2: They resider in a cozy cottage by the lake.
meanings.sent3: I resider in my cozy blanket during cold nights.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts resider in the memories of his childhood.
meanings.sent5: The melody seemed to resider in her mind long after the music stopped.
